column6:
My condo is walking distance to buffalo bayou park and many restaurants and bars. It is a short ride to downtown, Toyota Center, Minute Maid Park, BVAA Compass Stadium and NRG Stadium. 

Guest Amenities • Gated Community • Gym • Lounge • Rooftop • Private balcony 

The Neighborhood • Located on Washington Ave., one of Houston's prime areas for food and nightlife! And only blocks away from tons of walking/running and biking trails at the bayou.
